00066         template <typename T, precision P> 
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P>::tmat3x2()
00068         {
00069                 this->value[0] = col_type(1, 0);
00070                 this->value[1] = col_type(0, 1);
00071                 this->value[2] = col_type(0, 0);
00072         }

00075         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P>::tmat3x2

00078         )
00079         {
00080                 this->value[0] = m.value[0];
00081                 this->value[1] = m.value[1];
00082                 this->value[2] = m.value[2];

00113         template <typename T, precision P>
00114         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P>::tmat3x2
00115         (
00116                 T const & x0, T const & y0,
00117                 T const & x1, T const & y1,
00118                 T const & x2, T const & y2
00119         )
00120         {

00123                 this->value[2] = col_type(x2, y2);
00124         }

00127         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P>::tmat3x2
00128         (
00129                 col_type const & v0,
00130                 col_type const & v1,

00136                 this->value[2] = v2;

00140         // Conversion constructors
00141         template <typename T, precision P>
00142         template <
00143                 typename X1, typename Y1,
00144                 typename X2, typename Y2,
00145                 typename X3, typename Y3>
00146         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P>::tmat3x2
00147         (
00148                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1,
00149                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2,
00150                 X3 const & x3, Y3 const & y3
00151         )
00152         {
00153                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1));
00154                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2));
00155                 this->value[2] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x3), value_type(y3));
00156         }
00157 
00158         template <typename T, precision P>
00159         template <typename V1, typename V2, typename V3>
00160         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P>::tmat3x2
00161         (
00162                 tvec2<V1, P> const & v1,
00163                 tvec2<V2, P> const & v2,
00164                 tvec2<V3, P> const & v3
00165         )
00166         {
00167                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);
00168                 this->value[1] = col_type(v2);
00169                 this->value[2] = col_type(v3);
00170         }

00471    
00472         template <typename T, precision P>
00473         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x2<T, P>::col_type operator* 
00474         (
00475                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m, 
00476                 typename tmat3x2<T, P>::row_type const & v)
00477         {
00478                 return typename tmat3x2<T, P>::col_type(
00479                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[1][0] * v.y + m[2][0] * v.z,
00480                         m[0][1] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y + m[2][1] * v.z);
00481         }
00482 
00483         template <typename T, precision P>
00484         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x2<T, P>::row_type operator*
00485         (
00486                 typename tmat3x2<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00487                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m)
00488         {
00489                 return typename tmat3x2<T, P>::row_type(
00490                         v.x * m[0][0] + v.y * m[0][1],
00491                         v.x * m[1][0] + v.y * m[1][1],
00492                         v.x * m[2][0] + v.y * m[2][1]);
00493         }
00494 
00495         template <typename T, precision P>
00496         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P> operator*
00497         (
00498                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m1,
00499                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m2
00500         )
00501         {
00502                 const T SrcA00 = m1[0][0];
00503                 const T SrcA01 = m1[0][1];
00504                 const T SrcA10 = m1[1][0];
00505                 const T SrcA11 = m1[1][1];
00506                 const T SrcA20 = m1[2][0];
00507                 const T SrcA21 = m1[2][1];
00508 
00509                 const T SrcB00 = m2[0][0];
00510                 const T SrcB01 = m2[0][1];
00511                 const T SrcB02 = m2[0][2];
00512                 const T SrcB10 = m2[1][0];
00513                 const T SrcB11 = m2[1][1];
00514                 const T SrcB12 = m2[1][2];
00515 
00516                 tmat2x2<T, P> Result(tmat2x2<T, P>::_null);
00517                 Result[0][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB00 + SrcA10 * SrcB01 + SrcA20 * SrcB02;
00518                 Result[0][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB00 + SrcA11 * SrcB01 + SrcA21 * SrcB02;
00519                 Result[1][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB10 + SrcA10 * SrcB11 + SrcA20 * SrcB12;
00520                 Result[1][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB10 + SrcA11 * SrcB11 + SrcA21 * SrcB12;
00521                 return Result;
00522         }
00523 
00524         template <typename T, precision P>
00525         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P> operator*
00526         (
00527                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m1,
00528                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m2
00529         )
00530         {
00531                 return tmat3x2<T, P>(
00532                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2],
00533                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2],
00534                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2],
00535                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2],
00536                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[2][2],
00537                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[2][2]);
00538         }
00539 
00540         template <typename T, precision P>
00541         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x2<T, P> operator*
00542         (
00543                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m1,
00544                 tmat4x3<T, P> const & m2
00545         )
00546         {
00547                 return tmat4x2<T, P>(
00548                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2],
00549                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2],
00550                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2],
00551                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2],
00552                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[2][2],
00553                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[2][2],
00554                         m1[0][0] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[3][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[3][2],
00555                         m1[0][1] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[3][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[3][2]);
00556         }

00598         // Boolean operators
00599 
00600         template <typename T, precision P>
00601         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00602         (
00603                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m1,
00604                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m2
00605         )
00606         {
00607                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]) && (m1[2] == m2[2]);
00608         }
00609 
00610         template <typename T, precision P> 
00611         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00612         (
00613                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m1, 
00614                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m2
00615         )
00616         {
00617                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]) || (m1[2] != m2[2]);
00618         }
00619 
00620 } //namespace detail
00621 } //namespace glm
